title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set
OB: An error is shown when trying to create a new table group without setting a dataset.
EB: The group dialog should be shown and allow the creation of a new group, regardless of whether a dataset is set or not.
SR: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set. To reproduce the issue, add a table report item without setting a dataset, then try creating a new table group.
